name: Unalone
description:
Use fullscreen

The trails ahead are too great to face alone, but with the help of your party you can make it through.

Unleash epic combos and forge a path to victory.

HOW TO PLAY

Light attacking foes will cause a stager meter to go up, the higher the stager, the more damage you deal with heavy attacks.

Build up stager to unleash one MASSIVE attack.

Defend other members of your party to keep them alive.

Enemies will show you what they'll do on their next turn, so plan ahead accordingly.

Each of your party members has different strengths and weaknesses.

Flint is an all arounder.

Euprasie has low defence but deals lots of damage on her light attacks.

Chad is very defensive and has good heavy attacks.

This is the first game I've ever made, so hopefully, it isn't too bad.
